application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3 (Materials) & Condition 4 (Landscaping) of planning permission ref 15348/APP/2021/615 dated 14-10-22 (Addition of a storey to provide 5 flats with rooftop amenity space and associated works).
decision_conditions: Insufficient details have been submitted to discharge conditions 3 and 4 of planning permission refence 15348/APP/2021/615 dated 14-10-22. The submitted details fail to ensure that the development will present a satisfactory appearance, will preserve and enhance the visual amenities of the locality and provide adequate facilities in compliance with Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMHB 14, DMEI 1 and DMT 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).
